nodes.text: 3-76 was a droid owned by Elad Zhalto in the year 3 ABY. One day Elad Zhalto hired Isabalia to convince Na'Tala to return to his employ, in part by saying he would send his 3-76 if she did not agree; Isabalia knew sending 3-76 meant Na'Tala would be killed. She accepted the job and collected Na'Tala.

3-76 first appeared in "Beyond the Clouds", a short story by Lilliam Rivera that was published in the 2020 anthology From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. The character was initially revealed but not identified in a promotional tweet from Del Rey's account for Star Wars books.
